channel.title: How do you change the starting location?
channel.description: Ok, I have a server but I want to change the starting location of the source, which is DDSspec, can anyone give me a example of what the code should look like while I am looking for it or tell me where I should look for this info? Thanks!

item.title: How do you change the starting location?
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Ok, go into your Player.java and search either the X or Y coordinate of your current starting location.

Then, just change both of them to what you want the new location to start off. Don’t forget you need to keep searching again, because most most likely your source has it when they die, they go to that location too. You have to change that one aswell, just keep searching for the current X or Y coordinate until there isn’t any more to find.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the starting location?
